column4: i'm trying to access a "shared folder" on a network at "Windows", from "ubuntu" ,, it keep asking "Password required for "name-pc" ,, the pc has no password to it ,, it's a home conneciton network kinda thing ,, how can i access it ,, plz help
you should try a pass on the sindows machine
windows* I have had that issue, Windows doesn't like filesharing without pword
